name: Shadow Corridor
summary: Immerse yourself in the latest chapter of the popular, Japanese indie horror title, Kageroh: Shadow Corridor. Survive against the onslaught of horrors that lie in wait in eerie, traditional Japanese locales that change with every playthrough.
info:
• 中文名: 影之回廊
  • 开发: KazukiShiroma

  • 别名: 影廊
  • 别名: Kageroh: Shadow Corridor
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: Horror
